Welcome to Carve

FEATURED BY

How it works

Sign up

  • 1.

    Book a car

    Browse cars owned by local dealerships. G-Wagens for trips to Yosemite or Mustangs for weekends in Napa. 🙌🙌

  • 2.

    Pick it up

    We pay for your Uber ride to the pickup location. Yep, that’s right. When you get there, just unlock the car and drive off.

  • 3.

    Drop it off

    When you’re done, park the car where you picked it up. No paperwork or people involved. We’ll pay for your ride back home. ✌️

This is Carve

Renting a car should be about getting you in the perfect car as quickly and effortlessly as possible. That’s why we’ve set out to create a new kind of car sharing platform - one that puts you at the center of every decision we make, so you can focus on where your adventure is taking you.

Seamless Pickup and Dropoff

No lines, no paperwork, and no people. Free Uber credit to get you there and back.

Sublime Cars

Browse by model to find the perfect car for your trip.

24/7 Support

Real people, not robots. Always here. Just give us a call.

Everything’s Included

Comprehensive insurance and tolls. Add additional drivers for free.

Our Cars

We partner with dealerships to rent out cars that would otherwise just sit on the lot, which means you get the coolest cars at the best prices.
